DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Pico laser effective safe treatment unwanted tattoo .
DOC.brief_title: Laser Treatment Tattoos With Pico Laser
DOC.detailed_description: The Investigational device dual wavelength laser system develop treatment pigment lesion tattoo removal . The base unit GentleMax Pro laser system modify emit light wavelength 532 1064 nm deliver pulse energy 400mJ , pulse duration 700 p . A multicenter study .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Has Fitzpatrick skin type IIV 2 . Has unwanted noncosmetic tattoo ( ) wish undergo laser treatment remove 3 . Is willing consent participate study 4 . Is willing comply requirement study include photograph , follow post treatment care attend treatment follow visit 1 . Is hypersensitive light exposure 2 . Has active sun tan 3 . Has Fitzpatrick skin type V VI 4 . Has active localize systemic infection 5 . Is take medication ( ) sunlight contraindication 6 . Has history squamous cell carcinoma melanoma 7 . Has history keloid scar 8 . Has use oral isotretinoin ( AccutaneÂ® ) within 12 month initial treatment plan use course study . Note : Skin must regain normal degree moisture prior treatment . 9 . Has history immunosuppression/immune deficiency disorder ( include HIV infection AIDS ) use immunosuppressive medication 10 . Is female pregnant , pregnant within last 3 month , currently breast feed plan pregnancy study period 11 . Is allergic lidocaine , tetracaine Xylocaine epinephrine
